whyUs.title: Why Us
whyUs.description: We stand out with experience, integrity, and full commitment to serving our clients. With us, you will receive legal solutions delivered with unmatched professionalism and expertise.

clients.text: Legal cases successfully handled for our valued clients

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: At Shibl Legal, we provide a comprehensive range of legal services tailored to meet our clients' needs. Whether you are an individual seeking legal advice or a company requiring full legal support, we are here to be your trusted legal partner.
services.description: At “Shibl Legal,” we offer a comprehensive range of legal services tailored to meet our clients’ needs. Whether you are an individual seeking legal advice or a company looking for complete legal support, we are here to be your trusted legal partner.

defense.title: Pleading and Defense
defense.description: Our legal team represents clients before courts and various judicial authorities to protect their rights and achieve justice.

contracts.title: Contract Drafting
contracts.description: We assist in preparing and drafting all types of contracts to protect your legal rights and serve your interests.

representation.title: Judicial Representation
representation.description: We represent our clients in all legal proceedings and complex cases to ensure a smooth and effective legal process.

consulting.title: Legal Consultations
consulting.description: We provide precise and reliable legal advice to help you make the right decisions in personal or business matters.

company.title: Company Formation
company.description: We provide company formation services and prepare all the required legal documents to start your business correctly and lawfully.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: All the questions that come to your mind to learn more about Shibl Law Firm

items.label: What legal services does Shibl Law Firm provide?
items.content: We offer a wide range of legal services including legal consultations, contract drafting, court representation, company formation, commercial arbitration, and judicial execution.

items.label: How can I contact the Shibl Legal team?
items.content: You can contact us via email, phone, or by using the contact form on our website.

items.label: How can I book a legal consultation?
items.content: You can book a legal consultation through our website by selecting a convenient time for you.

items.label: Do you provide legal services only for companies or also for individuals?
items.content: We provide comprehensive legal services for both companies and individuals alike.

items.label: What are your working hours?
items.content: Our office is open from Sunday to Thursday, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, excluding public holidays.

items.label: Do you handle international legal cases?
items.content: Yes, our legal team is experienced in handling international cases and cross-border legal matters.

items.label: Can I get an online legal consultation?
items.content: Yes, you can request an online consultation via video call or email for your convenience.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We’re here to help! Get in touch with us via phone or email, or visit our office. You can also use the interactive map to locate us accurately.

footer.title: Shebl Law Firm
footer.description: Learn about our vision and mission that we strongly believe in. Discover the story behind the founding of our firm and the legal journey that made us one of the leading law offices. We work with dedication to achieve justice and serve our clients.
